text: (me siyalla mese tibiyadi) ovun jinvarungen bohomayak allahta samanayan bavata pat karannaha. ehet ema jinvarunvada, ohuma utpadanaya karanneya. movun (tamange) nodænuvatkamin allahta pirimi, gæhænu, parampara daruvanvada aropanaya karannaha. ebævin movun (mese) varnana kirimen ohu itamat parisuddhavantayeku ha sresthayeku vasayen sitinneya
